title: Some ProjectImportedEventArgs are not sent?
body:
We have a binlog where some projects don't have any ProjectImportedEventArgs and this is suspicious.

Reported by @jkoritzinsky 

Binlog is at: \\kirillo2\public\Bugs\MSBuild5857\jekoritz.binlog

It contains a total of 856 import events (514 imported + 342 not imported).

Some evaluations such as both evaluations of NativeExports.csproj don't have any import events associated with them.

This doesn't appear to be a viewer issue since playing back the log in text format also results in same numbers.
